DOC.brief_summary: Specific CT Enteroclysis findings with or without other clinical and laboratory variables, can identify Crohn's disease patients who will response to medical therapy versus those who will either fail and require surgery or have uncontrolled disease.
DOC.brief_title: Can CT Enteroclysis Predict the Outcome of Crohn's Disease
DOC.criteria: Crohn's disease with CT Enteroclysis during symptomatic treatment Crohn's disease subjects who have had a followup less than 1 year, without surgery Crohn's disease subjects that were later diagnosed with a bowel malignancy
